books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: Stone Barrington seeks a restful stay in the English countryside, but relationships with neighbors complicate matters.
books.name: SCANDALOUS BEHAVIOR

books.author: by Elizabeth Strout
books.description: A woman struggles with memories of her impoverished and disturbing childhood and its effect on the present as she attempts to reconcile with her mother.
books.name: MY NAME IS LUCY BARTON

books.author: by Michael Punke
books.description: Left for dead after a mauling, the master tracker Hugh Glass is consumed by a singular desire for revenge; an inspiration for the 2015 film.
books.name: THE REVENANT

books.author: by Elle Kennedy
books.description: A newly single graduate finds her attentions turning to a hockey star.
books.name: THE SCORE

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Kristen Ashley
books.description: A schemer finds an outsider like himself, but does she need to be protected from his wiles?
books.name: SEBRING

books.author: by Audrey Carlan
books.description: Mia becomes a high-priced escort to pay off her father's gambling debts.
books.name: JANUARY

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: When Travis meets his new neighbor, his bachelor status erodes.
books.name: THE CHOICE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Tami Hoag
books.description: Minneapolis detectives Nikki Liska and Sam Kovac investigate separate cases that eventually intersect.
books.name: THE BITTER SEASON

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A family home on an Australian island is bequeathed to an outsider, and the clan's conflicts come with it.
books.name: THE LAST ANNIVERSARY

books.author: by Alan Dean Foster
books.description: There are new disturbances in the force in this novelization of the film franchise's seventh installment.
books.name: THE FORCE AWAKENS
